data.title: Sancho I of Portugal
data.meta_description: Sancho I (su), nicknamed the Populator (Portuguese o Povoador), King of Portugal (Coimbra, 11 November 1154  26 March 1211) was the second but only surviving legitimate son and fifth child of Afonso I of Portugal by his wife, Maud of Savoy.
